channel.title: Any good C++ Books?
channel.description:
Hello!
My primary source of learning C++ have been the internet but I'd like a book as well. Books are good as you can read them when you don't have a computer available. So my question is: Do anyone know a good book about C++? I know pretty much, but anyways, any good book about C++ will do.
Thanks in advance,

item.title: Any good C++ Books?
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

go on demonoid. And search “all c and C++ learning books” you will see one by wuteva. Its a huge pack. I always recommend you see his other packs they are great.

Read full topic
